column4: Description
column5: Pre-conditions

column7: Expected Results

column4: Validate Nucleus server is running and accessible
column5: Nucleus server deployed and configured
column6: 1. Check Nucleus service status; 2. Verify web interface accessible; 3. Test API endpoint response; 4. Validate license activation
column7: Nucleus server healthy and accepting connections

column4: Validate high availability failover between Nucleus servers
column5: Primary and replica Nucleus servers configured
column6: 1. Simulate primary server failure; 2. Monitor failover detection time; 3. Verify client reconnection; 4. Confirm scene data consistency
column7: Failover completes within heartbeat interval; no data loss

column4: Validate USD scene upload and storage on Nucleus
column5: Nucleus server running; test USD scene prepared
column6: 1. Upload test USD scene via Omniverse client; 2. Verify scene stored on Nucleus; 3. Check file integrity; 4. Validate scene accessible from other clients
column7: USD scene uploaded and accessible with correct data

column4: Validate real-time synchronization of USD scene edits
column5: Multiple Omniverse clients connected to same scene
column6: 1. Make edit on client A; 2. Verify edit appears on client B within 1 second; 3. Test conflict resolution; 4. Validate checkpoint creation
column7: Edits synchronize in real-time across all clients

column4: Validate Autodesk Revit connector USD export
column5: Revit installed with Omniverse connector; test project available
column6: 1. Open test Revit project; 2. Export to USD via connector; 3. Verify USD scene on Nucleus; 4. Validate geometry and materials
column7: Revit model exports to USD with correct geometry and materials

column4: Validate SolidWorks connector USD export
column5: SolidWorks installed with Omniverse connector; test assembly available
column6: 1. Open test SolidWorks assembly; 2. Export to USD via connector; 3. Verify USD scene on Nucleus; 4. Validate CAD geometry
column7: SolidWorks assembly exports to USD with accurate geometry

column4: Validate McNeel Rhino connector USD export
column5: Rhino installed with Omniverse connector; test model available
column6: 1. Open test Rhino model; 2. Export to USD via connector; 3. Verify USD scene on Nucleus; 4. Validate NURBS conversion
column7: Rhino model exports to USD with correct surface data

column4: Validate Blender USD export and live sync
column5: Blender installed with USD support; test scene available
column6: 1. Open test Blender scene; 2. Export to USD; 3. Verify scene on Nucleus; 4. Test live sync capability
column7: Blender scene exports to USD with animations preserved

column4: Validate Autodesk Maya connector USD export
column5: Maya installed with Omniverse connector; test scene available
column6: 1. Open test Maya scene; 2. Export to USD via connector; 3. Verify USD scene on Nucleus; 4. Validate animation data
column7: Maya scene exports to USD with complete animation data

column4: Validate simultaneous multi-user editing of USD scene
column5: 10+ users connected to same USD scene
column6: 1. Connect 10 users to same scene; 2. Each user makes edits; 3. Monitor synchronization; 4. Validate no conflicts or data loss
column7: 10+ concurrent users can edit without conflicts

column4: Validate USD scene versioning and branching
column5: USD scene with version history; users with different access levels
column6: 1. Create checkpoint of scene; 2. Create branch for review; 3. Merge changes back; 4. Validate version history
column7: Version control operations complete correctly

column4: Validate AD SSO for Nucleus and Omniverse clients
column5: AD integration configured; test users in Omniverse groups
column6: 1. Log in with AD credentials; 2. Verify automatic Nucleus access; 3. Test group-based permissions; 4. Validate logout and session
column7: AD users authenticate automatically with correct permissions

column4: Validate round-trip between multiple CAD tools
column5: Multiple CAD connectors installed; test workflow defined
column6: 1. Export from Revit to USD; 2. Import to Maya for animation; 3. Re-export to USD; 4. Import back to Revit
column7: Cross-application USD workflow maintains data integrity

column4: Validate performance with scenes exceeding 50GB
column5: Large USD scene prepared (>50GB); high-performance workstation
column6: 1. Load large scene in Omniverse; 2. Navigate and edit scene; 3. Monitor memory usage; 4. Validate save operation
column7: Large scenes load and edit without crashes or corruption

column4: Validate RTX ray tracing meets rendering time targets
column5: RTX A6000 workstation; standard test scene prepared
column6: 1. Load standard test scene; 2. Start ray-traced render; 3. Measure time to completion; 4. Compare to baseline
column7: Rendering completes in <60 minutes (90% faster than CPU)

column4: Validate interactive ray tracing performance
column5: RTX A6000 workstation; representative scene loaded
column6: 1. Load production scene; 2. Enable real-time RTX preview; 3. Navigate scene with camera; 4. Measure frame rate
column7: Real-time preview maintains >30 FPS during navigation

column4: Validate NetApp storage meets I/O requirements
column5: 100 TB NetApp storage configured; benchmark tools ready
column6: 1. Run sequential read benchmark; 2. Run sequential write benchmark; 3. Test concurrent access from multiple clients; 4. Measure sustained throughput
column7: Storage achieves 10+ GB/s sustained throughput

column4: Validate network latency for collaboration
column5: 10 GbE network configured; latency monitoring active
column6: 1. Measure client-to-Nucleus latency; 2. Test under load conditions; 3. Monitor during multi-user editing; 4. Validate QoS effectiveness
column7: Network latency <10ms for Omniverse traffic

column4: Validate Nucleus handles 50 concurrent connections
column5: All 50 workstations configured; monitoring active
column6: 1. Connect all 50 clients to Nucleus; 2. Perform simultaneous operations; 3. Monitor server resources; 4. Validate response times
column7: Nucleus handles 50 concurrent users without degradation

column4: Validate 99.5% uptime requirement over test period
column5: Nucleus HA configured; synthetic monitoring active
column6: 1. Run system for extended test period (1 week); 2. Monitor availability metrics; 3. Calculate uptime percentage; 4. Review any incidents
column7: System maintains 99.5%+ availability

column4: Validate workstation stability under extended use
column5: RTX workstations deployed; stress testing tools available
column6: 1. Run 8-hour stress test on workstations; 2. Monitor GPU temperature and utilization; 3. Check for crashes or hangs; 4. Validate driver stability
column7: Workstations stable under sustained workloads

column4: Validate USD scene data consistency after failure
column5: Nucleus HA configured; test scenes with checkpoints
column6: 1. Simulate unexpected server restart; 2. Verify checkpoint recovery; 3. Validate scene data integrity; 4. Confirm no data corruption
column7: Data remains consistent after recovery from failure

column4: Validate RBAC for projects and scenes
column5: AD groups configured; test users with varying permissions
column6: 1. Test designer access to scenes; 2. Test admin-only operations; 3. Attempt unauthorized access; 4. Verify audit logging
column7: Access controls prevent unauthorized operations

column4: Validate TLS encryption for Nucleus communications
column5: TLS certificates configured; network monitoring tools
column6: 1. Monitor Nucleus client traffic; 2. Verify TLS 1.3 usage; 3. Check certificate validity; 4. Attempt unencrypted connection
column7: All traffic encrypted with TLS 1.3; unencrypted rejected

column4: Validate encryption at rest for USD scenes
column5: NetApp encryption enabled; test scenes stored
column6: 1. Verify storage encryption settings; 2. Check encryption keys; 3. Attempt direct storage access; 4. Validate encrypted backup
column7: All stored data encrypted at rest

column4: Validate comprehensive logging for compliance
column5: Audit logging enabled; test activities prepared
column6: 1. Perform scene access operations; 2. Review audit logs; 3. Verify user attribution; 4. Check log retention
column7: All scene access logged with user details

column4: Validate automated backup and restore procedures
column5: Backup configuration enabled; test scenes created
column6: 1. Trigger automated backup; 2. Verify backup completion; 3. Perform restore to test environment; 4. Validate data integrity
column7: Backups complete successfully and are restorable

column4: Validate RTO meets 4-hour requirement
column5: DR procedures documented; test environment available
column6: 1. Simulate complete Nucleus failure; 2. Execute recovery procedures; 3. Measure time to restore; 4. Validate service restoration
column7: Full recovery completes within 4 hours
